title: Here Comes the Golden Spoon! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cute Story   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty   Saints
author: Portofino   포르토피노
description: Adelaide Sergio never knew luxury until she was reborn as a wealthy count’s daughter. She was set to inherit the family estate, but her scheming sister’s sudden engagement has thrown everything off. With just two weeks to find a husband, Adele turns to the temple in search of a holy knight, only to find that their commander is the perfect man! He’s handsome, respectable… and completely uninterested. Can Adele win over the cold commander in time, or will the golden spoon be yanked from her mouth?>
